title: Kojima is on Vacatation and Still an Employee, Says Konami
text:
Kojima is on Vacatation and Still an Employee, Says Konami 
Published By: Gamespot.com - Today 
Konami has responded to reports Metal Gear creator Hideo Kojima has left the company, indicating he is still employee and is merely on a len...
